permissions: Allowed when a time card approval can be built for the pre-approval and the user is authorized to create that time card approval.
side_effects: Creates a time card pre-approval. May create or update a pre-approved time card when auto-submit is enabled, sends notifications unless skipped, caches driver movement, creates driver movement observation asynchronously, and touches the tender job schedule shift.
validation_notes: --tender-job-schedule-shift is required. --automatic-submission-delay-minutes is required when --should-automatically-create-and-submit is set. --maximum-quantities-attributes must be valid JSON when provided. tender_job_schedule_shift_id must be unique. explicit_down_minutes must be >= 0. explicit_end_at must be later than explicit_start_at when both are set. automatic_submission_delay_minutes must be > 0 when auto-submit is enabled. explicit_start_at must be reasonably close to the shift scheduled start (server validation). maximum quantities are validated for presence, positivity, and coverage of quantified service type/unit of measures; quantity-likelihood checks are skipped when skip_quantity_validation is true.

flags.name: --maximum-quantities-attributes
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON when provided.

flags.name: --automatic-submission-delay-minutes
flags.validation: Required and must be > 0 when --should-automatically-create-and-submit is set.
